name: A Place for Two Below the Tide
name_original: A Place for Two Below the Tide
description:
A fearless huntress is about to face her most difficult challenge yet: asking a mainlander to dance with her at the upcoming festival, despite not knowing anything about asking, dancing, or (to be honest) the mainland.  With the help of her sisters, though, she might learn just in time.

A Place for Two Below the Tide is a short work of interactive fiction by KC Shi. It's pretty gay.
